job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Our Company:
Genista Biosciences is a rapidly growing biotech startup company based in San Jose, CA dedicated to improving public health and food safety, both on the community and global scale.
About the Role:
- Collaborate with the UX/UI design team to ensure that vision is being properly followed
- Implement back-end functionalities for in-house mobile and web applications
- Provide ongoing maintenance, support and enhancements to the existing platform
- Define front end architecture and components, define user experience, handle state and client-side experiences
- Perform integrations tasks of various modules and components that have been developed by other engineers
- Work with the development team to help define system architecture
- Perform rigorous testing and bug-fixes on new and existing code
- Write scripts/programs for performing testing, automating tasks, and controlling robotics systems
Qualifications:
- BS or MS in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or other technology-related field
- Experience with either iOS or Android app development
- Experience with web technologies/frameworks like React, Django, and NodeJS
- Preferred Languages: JavaScript, Java, Swift, Objective C, Python
About the Position:
This is a full time position with competitive salary and health, vision, dental and life insurance benefits that are fully covered by Genista with no out-of-pocket expenses. Additional perks include gym membership, free on-site lunch, paid vacation, and a casual working environment.
